content:
I was surprise to find that grind could not close a goal of the following form: ∀ (i : α), i ∈ [] → p i, with p : α → Prop.

Should List.not_mem_nil be tagged with grind, in some way? From my understanding I feel like this really ought to be the kind of thing it can handle.
Yes, it is missing. Please add it locally for now, and I'll fix this soon.
Great. grind is such a good tactic - I am finding learning when to use it is just making some stuff so much faster.
